series_description: This series documents federal certification of End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) providers, psychiatric hospitals, outpatient physical therapy, portable x-ray, hospital swing beds, and Comprehensive Outpatient Rehabilitation Facilities. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, certification forms, survey reports, and correspondence.
disposition: last survey cycle then destroy in 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_title: Birth Related Neurological Injury(BRNI)/Hospital Review Records
series_description: This series documents a review of patient hospital records to ensure no fault occurred on the part of the hospital when a claim is made to the BRNI Fund
disposition: of record review then destroy in 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_title: Certificate of Public Need (COPN) Program Records
series_description: This series documents the issuance of a COPN to health care providers prior to the start of a new facility, major renovations, or purchase of major medical equipment
disposition: COPN Indefinite Extension issued then with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents federal certification of laboratories that test human specimens. This series may include, but is not limited to: survey reports, correspondence, and plans for corrections
